metrics.description: Response time for Critical severity incidents where the entire system is down with critical business impact. Must respond within 1 hour.
Resolution time goal for Critical severity incidents where the entire system is down with critical business impact. Target resolution within 4 hours.
Response time for High severity incidents where a major feature is broken or significant performance degradation exists with workaround available. Must respond within 4 hours.
Resolution time goal for High severity incidents where a major feature is broken or significant performance degradation exists. Target resolution within 24 hours.
Response time for Medium severity incidents involving minor bugs or localized issues where business operations continue. Must respond within 24 hours.
Resolution time goal for Medium severity incidents involving minor bugs or localized issues. Target resolution within 3 business days.
Response time for Low severity incidents including general questions, feature requests, or cosmetic issues. Must respond within 48 hours.
Monthly uptime percentage measuring service availability. Service credits apply when uptime falls below 99.9%: 5% credit for 99.0%-99.9%, 15% credit for 95.0%-98.9%, and 30% credit below 95.0%.
